articles.author: Jacqui Palumbo, Oscar Holland
articles.title: Anna Wintour stepping down as Vogue editor-in-chief - CNN
articles.description: After nearly four decades as the editor-in-chief of American Vogue, Anna Wintour is stepping down, and seeking a replacement.
articles.content:
After nearly four decades as the editor-in-chief of American Vogue, Anna Wintour is stepping down and seeking a replacement, the magazines publisher Condé Nast confirmed to CNN.

articles.title: Column | The American-born NBA superstar is disappearing. Enter Cooper Flagg. - The Washington Post
articles.description: Can the NBA’s No. 1 overall pick from Newport, Maine offset the dearth of younger American players capable of dominating the league?
